name: Cubefield Planet
description:
This is very addictive and interesting spaceship running game where you are the captain of the most successful spaceship.

Your mission is to drive spaceship in the hardest route of the history of mankind. Cubefield is the planet where the route is full of big and small cubes.

You have to drive spaceship carefully. Gameplay is easy, drive right or left, but be aware that your spaceship is easy to broke in the Cubefield gravity, so, don't crash with Cubes.

Route becomes harder and faster after some time and you are getting point for that.

Are you ready for the new adventure?
